name: Tell Me Why Two
overview: Tell Me Why Two is an interactive trivia game and sequel to Tell Me Why One. The game comes with an additional 175+ questions that need answering. Questions in the game are typical questions that curious children might ask. They come in five categories: our world, how things work, the zoo, how things began and the human body. Questions are supported with audio and visuals. The game comes with over 3 hours of fact filled presentations and interactive exhibits.
